name: Get a Room
description:
Collect rooms and build your way through a tiny dungeon.

Play mode:
WASD to move
E to pick objects

Edit mode:
WASD to move camera
Scroll or Z and X to zoom in/out
Click on tiles at the top to select them
Click in grid to add a selected tile
Drag a room to move it arount
Q and E to rotate rooms

Space to swap modes

Note: Currently, the game has pretty big performance issues and quite a few bugs. I'll make a cleaner version of this in post-jam.
